title: [BUG] SkiaSharp does not work in Blazor of Asp.Net 7 RC1
body:
**Description**

<!-- a general description goes here -->
SkiaSharp does not work in Blazor of Asp.Net 7 RC1

**Code**

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->
@page "/"

@using SkiaSharp
@using SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor

<SKCanvasView OnPaintSurface="OnPaintSurface"/>

@code {

    void OnPaintSurface(SKPaintSurfaceEventArgs e)
    {

        var canvas = e.Surface.Canvas;

        using var paint = new SKPaint { Color = new SKColor(0xEB000000) };
        canvas.DrawLine(0, 0, 300, 300, paint);
    }
}

**Expected Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->
A line will be drawn

**Actual Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->
Got exception:
System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo' threw an exception.
        ---> System.DllNotFoundException: libSkiaSharp

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue --> 2.88.2
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working --> .net 6
- IDE:  <!-- Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac / MonoDevelop / Visual Studio Code --> VS 2022 17.4.0 preview2
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
